column5: For easy image resizing, try Image Resizer for Windows XP. http://www.microsoft.com/windowsxp/downloa...ppowertoys.mspx  Stan
I use that one works great works great, there is also an online one as well, so theres no downloading another program, I'll add the link when i get home.
Thanks for the link I downloaded it and looks like the cat's meow would have saved me a lot of trouble yesterday trying to do my avatar.  vance

Guys,  theres no need to download anything.  Open up your picture in Windows Paint and go to tools at the top...click Sketch/Skew.  Its pretty straight forward. Its starts at 100x100 and I usually shrink them to 30x30  Just make sure to save in JPG format.
Thank you, my whole art club has been bugging me every time they wanted their images resized. I'm going to send them the link.  Pam
